schema.name: 4 Ingredient Pancake

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the saba bananas and mash them thoroughly in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs until they are well mixed.
Combine the mashed saba bananas with the beaten eggs. Stir in the clabber girl (baking powder) until the mixture is well combined.
Heat the virgin coconut oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of the pancake mixture into the pan. Cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Repeat with the remaining batter. Serve the pancakes hot.

schema.description: Dive into a healthier lifestyle with these easy-to-make 4 Ingredient Pancakes. Perfect for those following a low-sodium diet, these pancakes are not just nutritious but also cater to your health goals. Enjoy the unique blend of flavors and start your day with a healthified twist!
